attributes.action: grant asylum in the UK to Iraqi interpreters and other professionals who have worked on our behalf and whose lives will be in danger
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When British forces are withdrawn from Iraq it is clear that interpreters and others who have worked for us will be at risk from death squads as "collaborators". We therefore believe that this country has a duty to provide asylum for these individuals and for their close families as other countries such as Denmark have accepted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
